Statute.Title: Canada Early Learning and Child Care Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Apprentissage et la garde des jeunes enfants au Canada, Loi sur l’)

Minister.Text: Minister of Employment and Social Development see SI/2025-42

General.Text: Report to be tabled in each House of Parliament, 2024, c. 2, s. 16(2)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 2, ss. 1 to 8 and 16 in force on assent (19.03.2024),

Item.Text: — ss. 9 to 15 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 17 — Not in force

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 30, s. 37 in force on assent 27.11.2024, (Coordinating amendment — conditions met (27.11.2024 see s. 37)
